0.1.name: wordpress/swarm-cdn
0.1.description:
[SwarmCDN] (http://swarmcdn.com) is the first peer-to-peer content delivery network using WebRTC. This wordpress plugin, in conjuction with a SwarmCDN account, will greatly simplify the process of getting SwarmCDN setup on your wordpress site.

SwarmCDN provides a seamless (behind the scenes) real time network of your surfers so that they serve content to each other (and only each other while they’re on your site). For every image that your surfers serve to each other that is content that is not served via your host and therefore you save money. If you’re already using a CDN you can simply add SwarmCDN to your existing CDN.

You can read more extensively about Swarm CDN at our site [SwarmCDN] (http://swarmcdn.com)

*If you do not load your images from the same domain as your wordpress site you should see the support
